result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard Thomas Ellis

defendant.name: Ellis, Richard Thomas
defendant.address: 100 West Iron St., Gogebic County Jail, Bessemer, MI 49911

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on December 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on July 6, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Def shall not possess any firearms until case concluded.

10:01 AM Attorney Daniel W Johns in court for Defendant Richard Thomas Ellis. Prosecuting Atty Matthew J Tingstad appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Richard Thomas Ellis appeared by video means from GCJ.  DA requests $2500 sig bond since in jail and has counsel.  Not to possess any dangerous weapons.  Def doesn't know how long will be in GCJ.  Court inquires as to MI charges.  Atty Johns agrees with sig bond but amount is excessive for misd. charge.  Court accepts recommendation of DA.  Def shall not possess any firearms until case concluded.  Bond will be faxed to GCJ.  Bond to be signed and returned.  Atty Johns has reviewed complaint with def.  Def pleads NG and requests PTC.  Court finds PC in complaint for bond.  7/6 at 2:45 p.m. for PTC.  Adj.  10:08 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on June 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Richard Thomas Ellis
Current: 100 West Iron St., Gogebic County Jail, Bessemer, MI 49911 United States  (Effective: 05-20-2022)
Prior: N10350 River St, Ramsay, MI 49959

9:56 a.m.  Court calls case.  Cites appearances.  Defendant Richard Thomas Ellis appeared by video means from GCJ. Prosecuting Atty Matthew J Tingstad appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Court questions  def re PD appt.  Court swears in def.  Court discusses appointing atty versus def getting his own.  Explains process.  Def to make decision on his own.  Court will appoint if def requests.  Court appoints Atty Dan Johns.  Def will be in Gogebic County for a while.  Case to be set for AIA on June 20.  If released from GCJ, needs to contact court with new address.  Adj.  10:01 a.m.  klr
for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency
Adjourned initial appearance on May 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:30 AM Defendant Richard Thomas Ellis not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA indicates he will get to Gogebic County for personal service.  New date of May 16 at 9:00 a.m.  Adj.  9:33 a.m.  klr
